properties.name: container.postgres.enabled
properties.description: property to activate the postgres container.

properties.name: container.postgres.name
properties.description: the name of the created container.

properties.name: container.postgres.image-name
properties.description: the image to be used to create the container.

properties.name: container.postgres.hostname
properties.description: the host name of the container.

properties.name: container.postgres.database.port
properties.description: the value of the exposed port.

properties.name: container.postgres.database.username
properties.description: the username to be used to access to database.

properties.name: container.postgres.database.password
properties.description: the password to be used to access to database.
